message_1:
A salesman needs to travel to 5 cities. Find the shortest possible route that passes through each city exactly once, given the following distance table:

| Cities | A | B | C | D | E |
|--------|---|---|---|---|---|
| A      | - | 3 | 1 | 7 | 4 |
| B      | 3 | - | 6 | 3 | 9 |
| C      | 1 | 6 | - | 2 | 5 |
| D      | 7 | 3 | 2 | - | 1 |
| E      | 4 | 9 | 5 | 1 | - |
message_2:
